data.title: Remember Me Racehorse Rescue
data.meta_description: Information on how you can help us care for, rehabilitate and retrain retired racehorses or adopt a horse of your own. 817-689-1214
data.text:
Aprizeindeed is a beautiful 5 year old thoroughbred mare available for adoption at Remember Me Rescue. She is a dark bay or brown mare standing 15.3 hands tall. She has correct conformation and very clean legs. She was not retired from a racing injury but because she wasn't happy being a racehorse. She was very nervous at the track and dreaded training. Her owners donated her to us to find her a home where she can be happy.

ADOPTION FEE
